item.title: Analyzing & Reducing the Need for Learning Rate Warmup in GPT Training
item.description: This study reveals that modifying optimizers to normalize updates based on angular changes and gradient signal-to-noise ratio significantly reduces the need for learning rate warmup in GPT training.

item.title: Randomized algorithms and PAC bounds for inverse reinforcement learning in continuous spaces
item.description: This paper presents randomized algorithms with PAC bounds for solving inverse reinforcement learning problems in continuous state and action spaces, offering robust theoretical guarantees and practica…
